main event: A military observation recorded the sighting of 2 unidentified objects in South Korea during April 1955.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 4-3 seconds., The sighting involved both visual and instrument observation., Reports suggest the objects were likely Lyrid meteors., The meteors are visible all night from mid-April to early May., Four separate reports contributed to this record.
sighted object: two unidentified objects, likely Lyrid meteors
